description:
Kintarou is a very strong boy who wants to find his father.  A man stays at a mansion filled with monster cats.  A rampaging bull destroys fields on moonlit nights.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kintarou / Nekodake no Neko / Tsukiyo ni Kakeru Ushi
Kintarou / The Cat of Nekodake / A Bull Running on a Moonlit Night
金太郎 / 根子岳の猫 / 月夜に駆ける牛
